H0.text: where are trigger points located in the body. Tendons

H1.text: where are trigger points located in the body. Ligaments

H2.text: where are trigger points located in the body. Fascia

H3.text: where are trigger points located in the body. muscles

A4.text: Trigger points form only in muscles. They form as a local contraction in a small number of muscle fibers in a larger muscle or muscle bundle.
